name: Puyo Puyo Arcade
description:
Puyo Puyo Arcade, a RPG Maker fangame inspired on the classic Puyo Puyo. Play with Arle and friends to defeat the mischievous Satan and put an end to his evil deeds.

Features

  • 6 playable characters and 3 character variations
  • Battle against 13 opponents on Story Mode,  every opponent has a different reaction to the character you are playing with
  • On Rally mode, you can battle against 18 opponents without checkpoints, you can also play other special battles with different battle rules
  • Mean Bean Machine songs
  • In-game Achievements
Controls
  • Arrows - Navigate through the menus
  • Z or SPACE - Confirm
  • X or ESC - Cancel
  • F5 - Toggle Fullscreen
  • F6 - Change window size
  • Other buttons are specified in-game
